files.description: CLI tool that scans agent output directories for duplicate build_runner.py and verify_artifacts.py, selects the best candidates via heuristics, normalizes paths/imports so the runner always writes to runtime/_build/, and installs the canonical pair into a stable repo location.

missionDescription: Consolidate duplicate runner + verification scripts into one canonical pair by selecting the best existing build_runner.py and verify_artifacts.py from agent output directories, placing them in a single stable repo location, and updating imports/paths so the runner always writes to runtime/_build/.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
There are multiple competing runner and verification implementations across agent outputs; without consolidation we cannot enforce goal_143/goal_102/goal_131 or stabilize CI.
